data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Rivera, Uruguay to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 95,950 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rivera, Uruguay
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Rivera to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.section_summary: On average, 6 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Rivera, Uruguay.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Pour your Spirit out on the 103,500 citizens of Rivera, Uruguay, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Rivera that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Minas de Corrales
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Minas de Corrales, Rivera, Uruguay.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Rivera, Uruguay.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Rivera, Uruguay to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Rivera, Uruguay has a population of 103,500.

We estimate Rivera has 7,550 people who might know Jesus, 61,304 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 34,646 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Rivera, Uruguay by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
